pageDescription: Assess your AI governance maturity level in 10 questions.

inventory.question: Do you have a registry of your AI systems?
inventory.description: A comprehensive inventory of AI systems used in your organization.

risk_assessment.question: Do you assess the risks of your AI systems?
risk_assessment.description: Systematic analysis of the potential impacts of each AI system.

data_protection.question: Do your AI systems process personal data in a controlled manner?
data_protection.description: Compliance with GDPR, Law 25, and data protection best practices.

bias_fairness.question: Do you have processes to detect algorithmic bias?
bias_fairness.description: Fairness tests, regular audits, and correction mechanisms.

transparency.question: Do you inform people when they interact with AI?
transparency.description: Transparency obligations and the right to explanation of automated decisions.

human_oversight.question: Can a human intervene in your AI decisions?
human_oversight.description: Oversight mechanisms and the ability to contest decisions.

regulatory_compliance.question: Do you follow the requirements of Law 25 or the EU AI Act?
regulatory_compliance.description: Regulatory monitoring and compliance with applicable legal frameworks.

incident_management.question: Do you have an AI incident reporting process?
incident_management.description: Procedures for detection, reporting, and resolution of incidents.

organizational_governance.question: Do you have roles or committees dedicated to AI governance?
organizational_governance.description: Organizational structure with clear responsibilities for AI.

training_awareness.question: Are your teams trained on responsible AI issues?
training_awareness.description: Training programs and awareness of AI ethics.

results.title: Your maturity score
results.subtitle: AI Governance
results.detailsLocked: Create your free account to unlock personalized recommendations by domain.

homepage.title: Assess your AI governance maturity
homepage.description: 10 questions to get your maturity score and personalized recommendations. Free, no commitment.
